fields.value: Integrated Postsecondary Education Data System (IPEDS):  Fall Enrollment, 1986

authorName.value: United States Department of Education. National Center for Education Statistics

authorAffiliation.value: United States Department of Education. National Center for Education Statistics

dsDescriptionValue.value: The Fall Enrollment survey is conducted annually by the  National Center for Education Statistics (NCES) as part of the  Integrated Postsecondary Education Data System (IPEDS). The survey  collects data that describe the status of student participation in  various types of postsecondary institutions. The data are collected by  sex for six racial/ethnic categories as defined by the Office for  Civil Rights (OCR). There are two parts included in this survey. Part  A, Enrollment Summary by Racial/Ethnic Status, provides enrollment  data by race/ethnicity and sex and by level and year of study of the  student. Part C, Clarifying Questions, supplies information on  students enrolled in remedial courses, extension divisions, and  branches of schools, as well as numbers of transfer students from in-state, out of state, and other countries.

topicClassValue.value: IDRC VI. Human Dimension of International Relations

fields.value: Version Date: 1999-07-01Version Text: 1999-07-01 Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: LRECL with SAS data definition statements;Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: (1) This survey of Fall Enrollment was the first  conducted under the IPEDS title, which replaced the Higher Education  General Information Survey (HEGIS). (2) The file consists of data  derived from three distinct survey instruments. (3) The codebook and  data collection instruments are provided as a Portable Document Format  (PDF) file. The PDF file format was developed by Adobe Systems  Incorporated and can be accessed using PDF reader software, such as  the Adobe Acrobat Reader. Information on how to obtain a copy of the Acrobat Reader is provided through the ICPSR Website on the Internet.; Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: Data file(s), and electronic documentation.;

distributorName.value: Inter-university Consortium for Political and Social Research

distributorAffiliation.value: Institute for Social Research, University of Michigan

seriesName.value: Integrated Postsecondary Education Data System (IPEDS) Series

otherGeographicCoverage.value: Virgin Islands of the United States

value: All postsecondary institutions in operation during fall  1986 in the United States and its territories (American Samoa, Guam,  Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands, and the Marshall Islands) and Department of Defense Schools outside the United States.

fields.value: The survey was mailed to 7,669 postsecondary institutions,  i.e., four-year, two-year, and public less-than-two-year institutions, and to a sample of less-than-two-year private institutions.
Checked for undocumented or out-of-range codes.
